original_title: Annette Insdorf on DEKALOG Krzysztof Kieślowski's Masterful Poetry
overview: Produced by Criterion in 2016, film professor Annette Insdorf, author of Double Lives, Second Chances: The Cinema of Krzysztof Kieślowski, examines the formal and thematic patterns of Dekalog.
title: Annette Insdorf on DEKALOG Krzysztof Kieślowski's Masterful Poetry
